permissions: User can create if they are an admin or are authorized to create the related material transaction via the delegated MaterialTransaction policy.
side_effects: Preloaded timestamp is derived from the material transaction's transaction time; creation queues background work to estimate preload minutes and may enqueue a shift assignment worker for certain integrated transactions.
validation_notes: --material-transaction and --trailer are required. material_transaction_id must be unique. preloaded_at and preload_minutes are server-derived and read-only. Relationships to material_transaction and trailer are create-only.

flags.name: --material-transaction
flags.validation: Must be a valid material transaction ID.

flags.name: --trailer
flags.validation: Must be a valid trailer ID.
